verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:42
verses.text: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:43
verses.text: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:44
verses.text: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:45
verses.text: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
